ingredients: bag of pre-kneaded dough (Trader Joe's is best)
recipe: Use flour and gently spread out the pizza dough without overworking it
Spread a spoonful of olive oil onto the top of the dough
Add a thin layer of sauce (less than you think) then the toppings
If using a pizza stone, see notes below. Cook at 425 for 6-8 minutes
If using a baking sheet, cook for 22 minutes at 425
